mapper.select: select code, count, date from eat where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into eat (id, code, count, date) values (#{id}, #{eat.code}, #{eat.count}, #{eat.date})
mapper.update: update eat set count = #{eat.count} where id = #{id} and code = #{eat.code} and date = #{eat.date}
mapper.delete: delete from eat where id = #{id} and code = #{eat.code} and date = #{eat.date}
mapper.select: select code, count, date from eat where id = #{id} and date between #{start} and #{end}
